summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of sourcing view restructure. Successfully verified all major features: removed 'Sourcing Workflow' heading, implemented 2-section layout (Candidates/Communications), unified candidate table with 18 candidates, proper filtering/search, chat-based interactions for rules/outreach/search, and all specified UI components working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay occasionally intercepts clicks on action buttons
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True in automation or manual retry

✅ Two section tabs visible: 'Candidates' (18) and 'Communications' (7) with counts
✅ Unified candidate table showing all 18 candidates sorted by match score
✅ Table columns correct: Candidate, Current Role, Exp, Source, Score, Match Reason, Actions
✅ Source icons working: Database (6), Globe (5), LinkedIn (7) with proper tooltips
✅ Match Reason column shows 2-3 line detailed text for each candidate
✅ Search functionality filters by name/role/skill (tested with 'Meera')
✅ Filters panel with Match Score and Source dropdowns working
✅ LinkedIn source filter shows 7 candidates, Very High score shows 4 candidates
✅ Clear filters button resets all filters correctly
✅ Communications table shows 7 messages with proper structure
✅ Communications columns: Candidate, Channel, Type, Message, Date, Response, Status, Actions
✅ Status badges working: Replied (green), Awaiting (amber), Declined (red)
✅ Channel icons present: LinkedIn, Email, WhatsApp with tooltips
✅ Set Rules button triggers chat Rules mode with existing rules displayed
✅ Chat rules mode allows adding new rules and 'done' command exits
✅ Candidate selection and bulk Send Message triggers Outreach mode
✅ Chat Outreach mode shows channel selection (WhatsApp, Email, LinkedIn)
✅ Message composition and confirmation flow working in chat
✅ Individual candidate Send Message triggers single outreach
✅ Refine & Source CTA triggers Search mode in chat with Q&A flow
✅ Search Q&A flow captures criteria and source selection
✅ All chat modes (default, outreach, search, rules) functioning properly
✅ Hover effects reveal action buttons (Resend, Send New, individual actions)
✅ Bulk action bar appears when candidates selected
✅ Cancel mode functionality works to exit special chat modes
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Consider adjusting z-index of Emergent badge to prevent click interception on action buttons. All core functionality working perfectly.
